name: @aliser/vector2
description: Some basic functionality to represent and work with 2D vectors.

scripts.build: npm run readme && tsc && minify dist/temp/index.js > dist/index.js && cpy dist/temp/index.d.ts dist && rimraf dist/temp
scripts.readme: rimraf readme.md && npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown src/index.ts && concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --dir-name-as-title docs > README.md && rimraf docs

author: @aliser
